summary: Implemented Medical Coding Agent with automated MedDRA/WHODD coding and LLM-powered suggestions

features_implemented: Multi-system medical coding support (MedDRA, ICD10, WHODD, SNOMED)
Dictionary-based term lookup with exact and partial matching
LLM-powered coding suggestions for complex terms
Confidence scoring and reasoning for all suggestions
Support for multiple term types (adverse events, medications, medical history)
Structured coding workflow for human review
coding_capabilities: Partial term matching for related concepts
Context-aware LLM coding for ambiguous terms
details.test_coverage: Comprehensive unit tests covering all coding methods and edge cases
details.compliance: Follows all project standards for configuration, logging, LLM interaction, and testing
